input.sentences: it was crucial to check the sound for the band in order to ensure a great concert .
the band is warming up to get ready for their performance in the school 's auditorium .
everyone loved the band and gave them a standing ovation .
but no one was more excited than the guitarist 's mother .
after the performance | it was the stage hands ' job to clean up .
output.sentences: Two men work sound at a show
A band rehearses for a show
People gather near the stage while the show goes on
People stand and applaud the band after their performance
